tombstone.epitaph:
Towel.Medium: cotton, linen
Technique: damask woven with one warp (white linen with red cotton stripes) and one weft (red cotton for borders and white linen for field), a variety of bindings used for tone. For example: in the border, the red background is 1&7 s. 1974-62-2.
